column1: Machine learning is transforming how we analyze data and make predictions.
Natural language processing enables computers to understand human language.
Deep learning models have revolutionized computer vision applications.
Transformers have become the dominant architecture for NLP tasks.
Embedding models convert text into dense vector representations.
Semantic search finds relevant documents based on meaning rather than keywords.
Fine-tuning allows pre-trained models to adapt to specific domains.
Vector databases enable efficient similarity search at scale.
Retrieval augmented generation combines search with language models.
Sentence transformers create embeddings optimized for semantic similarity.
Domain adaptation helps models perform better on specialized text.
Unsupervised learning extracts patterns from unlabeled data.
